features.name: Ops List Redesign — Card Grid with Enrichment Stats

stories.title: Add enrichment stats query to OpsPage
acceptance: New React Query fetches per-table enrichment stats: total cells with status='complete' + confidence IS NOT NULL, cells with status='pending', cells with status='failed'
Query batches all table IDs into a single Supabase RPC or aggregation query for efficiency
Returns a map of tableId → { enriched: number, pending: number, failed: number }
Derives per-table status: 'running' if pending > 0, 'error' if failed > 0 and no pending, 'success' if enriched > 0 and no pending/failed, 'idle' otherwise

stories.title: Restyle OpsPage with card grid design, filters, and stats bar
acceptance: Header: emerald gradient icon + 'Ops' title + subtitle + 'New Table' button (emerald-500)
Quick stats bar: table count, total rows, total enriched (emerald), running count (blue spinner) — separated by dividers
Search input + source filter dropdown + status filter dropdown
Card grid (3-col lg, 2-col md, 1-col sm) with: status indicator, name, source badge, row count, enriched count, enrichment progress bar, relative timestamp, hover actions (Open + More)
Empty state preserved with updated styling
All existing create-table modals (CSV, HubSpot, CrossOp) remain wired to 'New Table' button
